price: Allah yang menciptakan tujuh langit dan dari (penciptaan) bumi juga serupa. Perintah Allah berlaku padanya, agar kamu mengetahui bahwa Allah Mahakuasa atas segala sesuatu, dan ilmu Allah benar-benar meliputi segala sesuatu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِثۡلَهُنَّۖ يَتَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنَهُنَّ لِتَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمَۢا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī khalaqa sabʿa samāwātin wamina al-arḍi mith'lahunna yatanazzalu al-amru baynahunna litaʿlamū anna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun wa-anna al-laha qad aḥāṭa bikulli shayin ʿil'man
